page.title: 18STOBHILL-HOUSES
page.content: At Stobhill there are now a lot of {council }houses.They were built for slum clearance{.Private estates}were built later.The area used to be {farmland }and{market gardens.}There was a {rubbish tip}too.Most of the older people were born in Morpeth and moved into Stobhill.The{prefab houses} ,which are now smart {modernised {bungalows,}were built after the war for quick housing reasons.The fare to Morpeth was once only one old penny,now it is 20p.The children used to go to school in Morpeth,until Stobhillgate school was built.The houses in Stobhill estate are all named after the numbers from one to eleven.
